thread.section_title: LD Mountain Centre Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LD Mountain Centre | www.ldmountaincentre.com | 8 of 110
thread.title: Scott
thread.title_full: LD Mountain Centre reviewed by Scott

author: Scott
title: Scott
text: I live close-by to LD and work locally as a dry slope ski instructor. I've used their shop many times in person and also ordered online and everything has been 5 star. I wouldn't recommend anyone if I wasn't sure I could rely on my recommended persons getting the very best but for all my clients, I always recommend LD as the place to shop as they always have a fantastic line of kit, great specialist advice and also go out of their way to make sure you are 100% happy.
